reviewText: Product Description ~ Wonder Kids Exciting collection of Bible stories is featured on this 3 DVD Set Jonah & Friends; stories and songs from the Old and New Testaments. Songs are fun to sing and easy to remember. Voices of Steve Green, Annie Chapman, Larnelle Harris, Roy Clark, and more favorites. Recommended for children 2-6 years of age; includes 30 favorite Bible stories and songs; in convenient slipcase for storage. An excellent investment for the travel-listening
